name: photosphere-electron
description: The Electron desktop application for Photosphere

scripts.start:prod: concurrently --names="dev-server,electron" "pnpm --filter electron-frontend run start:prod" "pnpm run electron:dev"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently --names="dev-server,electron" "pnpm --filter electron-frontend run start" "wait-on --interval 5000 http://localhost:8080 && cross-env HTML_PAGE=http://localhost:8080 electron ."

author: ashley@codecapers.com.au
